definitions.definition: A mode of transportation, often a train , that travels quickly or directly, either on a regular schedule or as a special or excursion . Express trains often pass through stations along the way without stopping at them.
examples: I took the express into town.
Your attention please. Train 4715 is now boarding on track 3, section B. This train is an express . This train does not stop at Foo, Bar, or Fubar stations.

subdefinitions.definition: ( Philippines , chiefly Metro Manila ) a public utility vehicle , typically a jeepney , that traverses through an expressway

definitions.definition: A service that allows mail or money to be sent rapidly from one destination to another.
( obsolete ) A clear image or representation; an expression; a plain declaration.
A messenger sent on a special errand; a courier .
That which is sent by an express messenger or message.

main_definition: A mode of transportation, often a train , that travels quickly or directly, either on a regular schedule or as a special or excursion . Express trains often pass through stations along the way without stopping at them.
secondary_definitions: A service that allows mail or money to be sent rapidly from one destination to another.
( obsolete ) A clear image or representation; an expression; a plain declaration.
A messenger sent on a special errand; a courier .
That which is sent by an express messenger or message.

definitions.definition: The action of conveying some idea using words or actions; communication , expression .

main_definition: ( obsolete ) The action of conveying some idea using words or actions; communication , expression .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) A specific statement or instruction .
